overview: Surfing's greatest rivals meet head-on in a clash of two continents. Andy Irons, Kelly Slater, Bruce Irons and Cory Lopez represent for the Red, White and Blue. Australia's Coolie Kids Dean Morrison, Joel Parkinson and Mick Fanning team up with Taj Burrow and Hedgey to bring the Thunder from Down Under. Lower Trestles, J-Bay and The Superbank become ground zero in The Clask of The Surfing Titans. Fins fly as the boys hack apart every but of moving water that gets in their way. Who's on top now, Seppos or Aussies? You decide in this new filthy flick from Fisheye Films.
title: The Clash of Surfing Titans
